body: Hi Francesco, Please check the following. This study is run on a 10m X 10m x 10m box with gride size of 10 meters. The sample file is attached too. -Devang [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Fxq0VavCSuCHDblBUw*GvyI0hSKexUkJhAwol5OD3nR-iFNb6yIkSyF-BhPIlk-g98ogsGXmpUUR1J073Zb9IvLsyknlZDt-/10mX10mX10mTestGeometry.JPG) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Fxq0VavCSuBu24TenHfVVwzBKuK1ltb2c6yz4d7aP3kwgskVn6iWEFMxw8p28xLaEeM3mCH70YYt19yU5sJscBcARLDsAcZx/TotalSunlightHours.JPG)
